    • randomSubclass

      public static ArrayList<CommonObjective> randomSubclass(int num)
      Method that selects randomly a number of CommonObjectives equals to the int num and instantiate only the selected ones among the 12 totals.
      Parameters:
      num - Number of CommonObjective to instantiate.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing the instantiated CommonObjective.

    • checkCondition

      public abstract boolean checkCondition(Player player)
      Method to be implemented in each subclass that check if a player's bookshelf meets the criteria of the relative commonObjective.
      Parameters:
      player - Player whose bookshelf gets analyze.
      Returns:
      Boolean depending on the result of the analysis.

    • commonObjPointsCalculator

      public boolean commonObjPointsCalculator(Player player, int numOfPlayers)
      Method to calculate the commonObjective points.
      Parameters:
      player - player whose bookshelf gets analyze.
      numOfPlayers - number of player to assign points.
      Returns:
      true if the points are to add, false in other cases.
